japanese: うおお、ステーキとは豪華だな！

それが……ううっ……。
どうしてこんなことに……。
translation:
But... Ooohh...
Why did this happen...

japanese:
あーあ、これは肉のよさを
全部投げ捨てるような焼き方ね。
ほら、パサパサになってるもの。
translation:
Aa-ah, the way this steak is cooked,
it's like all the tenderness of the meat has been
tossed aside. Look, it's all dried out.

japanese:
なんてことだ……。
これは五月でなくても泣きたくなるな……。
translation:
Good lord...
This would make anyone cry, not just Itsuki...
I want to apologize to the meat...
